body.content:
-- 
Attention Beneficiary

This is to inform you that we have received an introduction/instruction
from the office of Dr António Guterres Executive  Director United Nations
Organization, to attend to you regarding the processing and release of your
grant winning award  benefit valued US$2,300,000.00 (Two million, three
hundred thousand United States Dollars only) via our bank telegraphic  wire
transfer services.

This fund was awarded to you in form of grant by the United Nations, World
Bank Group and European Union as the  beneficiary of the first batch of the
2021/2022 global fund support and International partnership as a means of
combating  the looming global financial crisis and is 100% legitimate. We
the HSBC Bank is the official remitting financial  institution (bank) to
handle and process the release of your funds.

However, we have concluded to process your own payment through Western
Union® Money Transfer, $5,000 daily until the total  sum of your awarded
fund is transferred to you.

For a smooth transfer of your first payment, you are advise to reconfirm
the follow information to the WESTERN UNION  department payment processing
manager Mrs. Judy Michael, Email address: (jdmichael@executivemail.co.za)
Tel: +1(570) 257- 6886

BELOW IS THE INFORMATIONS NEEDED FOR THE RELEASE.

YOUR FULL NAME:
CURRENT HOME ADDRESS:
TELEPHONE:
E-MAIL:
AGE:
PROFESSION:

Thanks
Linda Thomas-Greenfield
United States Ambassador
United Nations
